summary: Immortals Connor and Duncan MacLeod must join forces against Kell, an evil immortal who has become too strong for anyone to face alone.
cast: Adrian Paul|Christopher Lambert|Bruce Payne|Lisa Barbuscia|Donnie Yen|Jim Byrnes|Peter Wingfield|Damon Dash|Beatie Edney|Sheila Gish|Oris Erhuero|Ian Paul Cassidy|Adam Copeland|Mihnea Trusca|June Watson|Donald Douglas|Liviu Timus|Christopher Leps|Vernon Rieta|John Medlen|Douglas Aarniokoski|Thomas Lockyer|Charmian May|Paul Bigley|Daniel Parker|Jessica Mann|Robert Hewett|Kananu Kimiri|David J. Nicholls|Abigail Kingsbury|Candace Hallinan|Wendy Partridge|Vasile Albinet|Gabi Burlacu|F. Braun McAsh|Tony Swift
title: Los inmortales: Juego final
